Package com.topjohnwu.superuser.io

Class SuFileInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.topjohnwu.superuser.io.SuFileInputStream
  • public final class SuFileInputStream
extends Object
    Open InputStreams that read files with root access.

    Directly creating instances of this class is deprecated, please use the static helper methods to open new InputStreams.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static InputStream open​(File file)
      Open an InputStream with root access.
      static InputStream open​(String path)
      SuFileInputStream.open(new File(path))

      • open

        @NonNull
public static InputStream open​(@NonNull
                               File file)
                        throws FileNotFoundException
        Open an InputStream with root access.

        Unless file is an SuFile, this method will always try to directly open a FileInputStream, and fallback to using root access when it fails.

        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException
        See Also:
        FileInputStream(File)
